title: Workshop on Self-Regulated Learning Strategy Design Based on Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and fundamental knowledge in science education
context.additional_context: Blended instructional design combining flipped learning and self-regulated learning strategies in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design and utilize online learning materials suitable for the flipped learning model.
Learners apply self-regulated learning strategies (e.g., goal setting, time management, feedback incorporation) to actual instructional design.
Learners can analyze strategic differences across learner types using learning analytics tools.
Learners experience the process of improving learning design based on formative assessment results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
